thread.section_title: Business & Financial News, U.S & International Breaking News | Reuters
thread.title: Factbox: Trump on Twitter (Feb 28) - Heritage Foundation, border security

author: Reuters Editorial
title: Factbox: Trump on Twitter (Feb 28) - Heritage Foundation, border security
text:
The following statements were posted to the verified Twitter accounts of U.S. President Donald Trump, @realDonaldTrump and @POTUS.
The opinions expressed are his own. Reuters has not edited the statements or confirmed their accuracy.
@realDonaldTrump :
- The Heritage Foundation has just stated that 64% of the Trump Agenda is already done, faster than even Ronald Reagan. “We’re blown away,” said Thomas Binion of Heritage, President Trump “is very active, very conservative and very effective. Huge volume & spectrum of issues.” [0702 EST]
- I have decided that sections of the Wall that California wants built NOW will not be built until the whole Wall is approved. Big victory yesterday with ruling from the courts that allows us to proceed. OUR COUNTRY MUST HAVE BORDER SECURITY! [0729 EST]
- 45 year low on illegal border crossings this year. Ice and Border Patrol Agents are doing a great job for our Country. MS-13 thugs being hit hard. [0908 EST]
- Why is A.G. Jeff Sessions asking the Inspector General to investigate potentially massive FISA abuse. Will take forever, has no prosecutorial power and already late with reports on Comey etc. Isn’t the I.G. an Obama guy? Why not use Justice Department lawyers? DISGRACEFUL! [0934 EST]
-- Source link: ( bit.ly/2jBh4LU ) ( bit.ly/2jpEXYR )
Compiled by Bengaluru bureau
